dmca.title: [EV1-C1390777S] Copyright Violation : http://lightpilecreams.info
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----

Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [EV1-C1390777S] Copyright Violation :
http://lightpilecreams.info
Subject: [EV1-C1390777S] Copyright Violation :
http://lightpilecreams.info

MIME element (text/plain)
Attention Legal Department 
 
Please be advised that the domain http://lightpilecreams.info is in
violation of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act. (DMCA)
http://www.copyright.gov/legislation/dmca.pdf 
 
The site is displaying copy written material from other websites. 
We ask that the copyrighted material be removed ASAP, or we will make a
DMCA violation complaint to Google and Yahoo as well as other governing
bodies. 
 
Thank you for your immediate attention to this matter.
